comment: She's a nice lady, but she has been one of the worst professors I've had since I've been at KSU. She just seems so confused on everything. She doesn't even remember when assignments are due. I wouldn't recommend taking her unless you want to be confused.

This professor is one of the worst professors that I have ever had a KSU. She does not know how to operate her own class and ask us all the time when things are due. She is a really kind and caring person, but if I did not have hope to cover my tuition I would be extremely angry. We only meet once a month and all of her assignments are GROUP WORK.
